text_block_list.text: Finally, it's time for Haru Urara's debut race.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Urara debut～♪ Urara debut♪ It's time for the debut～!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: It's because I can finally make my debut! Debuting is amazing!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: When I make my debut, I'll be able to run a lot more than now!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I love running! That's why I'm so happy～!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Besides, I feel like I've become much stronger than before!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I had a lot of matches with the trainer, and I didn't lose even once!
If the result of our races gave her confidence, then the days of sore muscles will be worth it…

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: That's why I'm sure I'll be able to get first place today!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: No, I'll definitely get the first place! Time to go!
